maqras.text: Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami tomara prati imana anima neki athaca tomaka kerala nimnasraenira manuhe'i anusarana karaiche’
nuhe ka’le, ‘sihamte ki karae seya jana mora ki prayojana
‘sihamtara hicapa loraa kerala mora pratipalakarahe kama; yadi tomaloke buji palahemtena
‘arau muminasakalaka khedi pathi'oraa mora kama nahaya
‘Ma'ihe kerala ejana spasta satarkakarai’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘he nuha! Yadi tumi birata nohoraa tente arasye tumi sila daliya'i nihata karaa sakalara antarbhukta ha’ba’
Nuhe (praarthana karai) ka’le, ‘he mora raba! Mora sampradaye moka asbikara karaiche’
‘Seye tumi mora arau sihamtara majata spasta mimansa karai diya lagate moka arau mora lagara muminasakalaka raksa karaa’
Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra lagata yisakala achila sakaloke boja'i narata araohana karaa'i raksa karailo
Tara pichata baki thaka sakalaka duba'i marailo
Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechi bhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Ada sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
yetiya sihamtara bhatr hude sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa
‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
‘Tomaloke kiya pratito ucca sthanata ayatha saudha nirmana karaa
‘arau tomaloke enekai prasadasamuha nirmana karai acha, yeniba tomaloka sthayi
‘Arau yetiya tomaloke aghata karaa tetiya sbecchacarai hai aghata karaa
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa
‘Arau tomaloke takbaraa aralambana karaa se'i sattara yijane tomalokaka dana karaiche se'i sakalo bisaya, yibora tomaloke jana
‘Teraemi tomalokaka dana karaiche catuspada jantu arau putra santana
‘udyana arau jharnasamuha
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe eta maha dirasara sastira bhaya karao’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi amaka upadesa diya ba nidiya, ubhaye amara babe samana
‘Eya purbarartisakalarahe sbabhara
‘Ami ketiya'o sastipraapta naha'om’
Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile, phalata ami sihamtaka dhbansa karailo. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Chamuda sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
yetiya sihamtara bhatr chalehe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa
‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
‘Iyata yi ache tata tomalokaka niraapade erai diya ha’bane
‘udyana arau jharnasamuhata
‘sasyaksetrata arau sukomala joka bisista khejura baganata
‘arau tomaloke nipunatara saite pahara kati yibora grha nirmana karaicha
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka anusarana karaa
‘Arau tomaloke simalanghanakarai sakalara nirdesara anugatya nakaraiba
‘yisakale prthiraita biparyaya srsti karae arau sansodhana (tatha santi sthapana) nakarae’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘tumi haicha yadukaraibilakara an'yatama
‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, seye tumi yadi satyabadi horaa tente eta nidarsana lai aha’
Te'om ka’le, ‘e'ijani haiche (nidarsaniya) uta, iyara babe ache pani khoraara pala, arau tomalokara babe'o ache eta nirdharaita dinata pani khoraara pala
‘Arau tomaloke iyara kono anista sadhana nakaraiba, yadi (anista sadhana) karaa tente maha dirasara sasti tomalokara oparata apatita ha’ba’
Tathapi'o sihamte se'i utajanika badha karaile, parainamata sihamta anutapta ha’la
Eteke sastiye sihamtaka graasa karaile. Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Lutara sampradaye'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
yetiya sihamtara bhatr lute kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa
‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
‘Srstijagatara majata tomaloke kerala purausasakalara ocarate'i upagata horaa
‘arau tomalokara pratipalake tomalokara babe ye straisakalaka srsti karaiche sihamtaka tomaloke barjana karai thaka? Baram tomaloke haicha eta simalanghanakarai sampradaya’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘he luta! Tumi yadi birata nohoraa, tente niscaya tumi bahiskara ha’ba’
Te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara karmaka ghrna karao
(Te'om praarthana karai ka’le,) ‘he mora raba! Moka arau mora paraiyalaka sihamtara e'i karmara paraa raksa karaa’
Phalata ami te'omka arau te'omra paraiyalabargaka raksa karailo
Kerala se'i brd'dhajanira bahirae, yijani achila pichata arastharakarai bilakara antarbhukta
Tara pichata ami bakibilakaka dhbansa karailo
Arau ami sihamtara oparata sastimulaka silabrsti barsana karailo. Eteke bhiti pradarsitasakalara babe e'i brsti kimana ye nikrsta achila
niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara bechibhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
A'ikara adhibasisakale'o raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
yetiya chu'a'ibe sihamtaka kaichila, ‘tomaloke takbaraa aralambana nakaraibane
‘niscaya ma'i tomalokara babe ejana bisbasta raachula
‘Eteke tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora anugatya karaa
‘Iyara babe ma'i tomalokara ocarata kono pratidana nibicarao, mora pratidana kerala srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra ocarata
